post.author: Brendan
post.content:
Hi.

My company is looking for a .NET specialist who has around 4 to 5 years experience. The title is 'Technical Architect', but it's more like a senior of senior developer.

Who is expected to have...

* Excellent communication skills
* Strong MS and preferrable Java technology knowledge

FYI, the corp. site is www.blastradius.com

Please forward the resume to brendan.kim@gmail.com. Thanks.
post.title: .NET specialist (Internal posting)
